title: Pink Snow armor
summaries: The Pink Snow armor (on [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile) or Pink Eskimo armor (on [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console, 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version], and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader) is an armor set consisting of the three following pieces:

• Pink Snow Hood, Pink Snow Coat, and Pink Snow Pants
  • Pink Eskimo Hood, Pink Eskimo Coat, and Pink Eskimo Pants
Wearing the full set does not provide a set bonus. It grants a total of 4 defense.
It is crafted from the Snow armor by adding Pink Thread. It is completely identical to the original set, except in its color.

statistics.Sell: 240 (set)
